fields.title: Roof Replacement
fields.subtitle: If your roof is beyond repair, a roof replacement may be required. Call us for a free estimate!."
fields.description:
Although a well-maintained roof can last many years, the following are symptoms of a roof that needs to be replaced:

* Missing, loose, or cracked shingles
* Water damage due to roof failure
* Increased electric bills (leaking air)
* Algae growth
* Granule loss

If you see these symptoms, give Tetralto Roofing a call. We'll inspect your roof and give you an estimate for the replacement!

fields.title: Roof Repair
fields.subtitle: Extend the life of your roof with timely repairs.
fields.description:
Your roof is exposed to the elements, and it has to withstand a lot!

It can get damaged by weather, building settling and shifting, mechanical damage from trees and other objects in the wind, projectiles (we've even seen bullets) ‚Äì or just the passage of time.

If you notice any of these issues affecting your roof, it's time to call Tetralto Roofing. We'll come out and assess the damage and provide you with a quote for repair!

fields.title: Gutter Services
fields.subtitle: Are you in need of new gutters or repairs? Call us for an assessment now!
fields.description: Tetralto Roofing‚Äôs gutter services include installation of new gutters, gutter cleaning, and gutter repairs. We can provide a full assessment of the condition of your gutters and suggest the best course of action. We specialize in high-quality gutter installation and repairs and will provide you with a reliable, long-lasting solution. Give us a call today to discuss your gutter needs and get a free quote for the job!

fields.title: Expert Install Teams
fields.description: Each project lead has a minimum of 10 years of experience, and the entire team is trained in procedures, quality, and safety. We do it the right way, fuss over details, and clean up the mess.

fields.title: Roofing Science
fields.description: We complement experience with science - through training, studying the manufacturer's documentation, and investigating the current state of the art of roofing products.

fields.title: Highest Quality Roofing Systems
fields.description: We use the best roofing systems available and adhere to all guidelines from the manufacturer and construction codes.

fields.title: Honest Assessments
fields.description: We don't push for roof projects that aren't needed. If your roof is still functional, that is what we will report. Likewise if it only needs repairs.

fields.title: Great Warranty
fields.description: We provide a 2-year warranty on workmanship and adhere to guidelines from the manufacturer to maximize the warranty you get from them.

fields.title: Free Yearly Checkups
fields.description: For all roof replacements and major repairs, you get a free checkup for your roof every year. This allows us to detect and fix any potential problems early on and extend the life of your roof.

fields.title: Perpetual Roof Information File
fields.description: We keep a secure file about your roof, including pictures, invoices, and materials installed - and give you free access to it.

fields.name: Ryan D.
fields.text: Got our roof done in Missouri City, TX, after Hurricane Beryl in 2024. David and his roofing team are just awesome. Great presentation of options and materials, prompt replies to post-estimate questions. Best price on the new roof. Thorough communication. He was on-site for most of the 2-day process. Excellent follow-up. When I struggled just getting so-called top-rated roofing companies to show for an estimate, I really appreciated David's service, concise selling (no BS), no gimmicks like call these satisfied customers for $100 off. His crew was great and respectful too. Had a roofing friend check the roof a couple weeks after and he said it was all first-class work and materials.

fields.name: Marilyn C.
fields.service: Gutter Installation, Gutter Guards, Fascia & Soffit Repair
fields.text: Highly Recommended! We've used the Tetralto company a few times for major repairs on our home. Aesthetics of their quality work is seen from the street. Professionals - they cleaned up and removed items replaced or repaired as they stated.  5‚òÜ and a bag of Pita Chips with Texas Hot Sauce! Thank You, Tetralto! üëçüèΩ.

fields.name: Dana C.
fields.text: David and the crew did a great job and were very affordable. New roof and patio cover were completed as promised. Would highly recommended them are if you are looking for a roofing contractor..

fields.name: S. Gupta
fields.text: David and his team with Tetralto Roofing replaced the roof and Skylight of my house. Work was done in a professional manner and as per schedule. I would recommend Tetralto roofing for Roofing needs.

fields.name: Rob D.
fields.text: We needed our gutters cleaned and repaired. Excellent work and fair price. Would definitely recommend.

fields.name: Anthony B.
fields.text: Hurricane Beryl victims in Missouri City, Tx. Tetralto Roofing did a great job re-tarping my roof after the first tarp became damaged and no longer providing shielding from our roof leaks. Thank you, David Fohr.

fields.name: Lesley G.
fields.text: High quality work by a  professional team.  They were quick to repair our roof from damage caused by a fallen tree limb.  Friendly crew and reasonable pricing.

fields.name: E. Wong
fields.text:
From the beginning, David was very thorough explaining each step his crew will take from removing old roof, tarping the bushes/grass, repair damaged decking, installing new drip edge, installing underlayment (different ones for valleys and penetration), installing hip and ridge shingles (absolutely necessary for Houston weather), installing Bullet Boot Pipe flashings on all pipe penetrations, painting all metal flashings, etc. 

Dave was quite impressive with the all details and good knowledge with what's required (as opposed to those who cut corners) to make a good roof job. The crew started working early in the morning and finished by the evening.  Dave was in and out to make sure the work followed exactly the process that was laid out (which was spelled out in the contract).   Finally,  the crew thoroughly cleaned up the debris and even advised that if any debris had blown over to the neighbors, they would come back and clean up.   Overall, the job was efficient, thorough, and very professional. Compared to many roofers who tried to sell me their services, Tetralto Roofing absolutely stands out in terms of cost & quality.   I would highly recommend them to anyone who's looking for a professional well managed roofing company!

fields.name: D. Anderson
fields.text: Highly recommend David and Tetralto Roofing! I had a small, but very unexpected roofing issue and David was able to come out immediately to check out the situation, provided a quote the same day, and started work quickly. His team arrives when expected, is considerate, and leaves the property as they find it. Excellent experience!

fields.name: M. Garrett
fields.text: Tetralto Roofing replaced my roof and gutters at my home in Sugar Land Texas this year. All works was well coordinated and inspected once completed. I would recommend this contractor for anyone seeking to have a new or repaired roof.

fields.name: Adam S.
fields.text: Very attentive and professional, great roof for a great price. Would definitely recommend Tetralto Roofing.

fields.name: B. Grace
fields.text: I live in  Missouri City TX and one of my best experiences I've had Dealing with a contractor was with Tetralto roofing. And Here's why.From the initial contact to the very end, David was part of every step. During the first visit to my home he shows up with a presentation already put together presenting his company, measurements,  material and service he had to offer with a good price and options. This left me with ease and helped me to make a good and final decision. I had several roofers visit me but none of them compared to Tetralto in covering deals and a plan to get it all done.  He was very patient with me getting color choice, finance and HOA approval. They did an excellent job in removing. Installing and cleaning up afterwards.  There wasn't any hidden cost or surprises.  Everything was spelled out in the beginning.  Thank for your service and professionalism during my install.  I made the best decision.

fields.name: CS George
fields.text: I live in Missouri City and I had an emergency roofing issue. I had rain dripping into my living room with more rain to come. I selected Tetralto Roofing to come repair my leaking roof. David and his team came on time, diagnosed the cause of the problem, secured the needed materials and went to work. David kept me informed throughout the repair process. More rain was expected for the next day so they worked extra long to get the job finished. I am so grateful for their work ethic, knowledge and skills. I highly recommend Tetralto Roofing! I will plan to use them again when needed. Thanks, David.

fields.name: Anton G.
fields.text: I called them out to fix a big hole in the chimney. The owner answered and scheduled to come look at the damage, got me a quote the same evening that was super reasonable and had his crew out the very next morning to fix the damage. Even blew the leaves out of the gutter. Would highly recommend them.

fields.name: Lessly F.
fields.text: David takes great pride in his work and very informative and collaborative throughout the process. From the initial quote all the way to completion, David kept in touch frequently, updating progress and answering questions. He put down a great roof on my parents home at a reasonable price. I would definitely recommend Tetralto Roofing to anyone looking to repair or replace!

fields.name: Sobia B.
fields.text: David and his team are exceptional! I would highly recommend them for roofing ( Missouri City/Sienna)

fields.name: D. Tran
fields.text: Great communication by these guys. Quick response via text/messenger. Had these guys come out to do a roof maintenance(reseal/inspect/etc). Clear work description of the job and explained thoroughly of what was done and needed. Also emailed me a post service report explaining exactly what was found and done. Also great pricing for their service. I definitely recommend these guys for their work. And I will use them again for any future roofing needs.

fields.name: P. Vossos
fields.text: They responded quickly, did a good job at a very fair price. I recommend them highly with no reservations.

fields.name: Ravikanth G.
fields.text: David and his team at Tetralto did an amazing job for a complete roof replacement project.

fields.name: Hao L.
fields.text: David and his crew reinstalled my missing ridge vent before the rain came the next day. His price was reasonable too. Positive Responsiveness, Punctuality, Quality, Professionalism, Value

fields.name: Jubin M.
fields.text: David and crew is really professional and fixed my roof issue on time! Reasonable pricing too! Positive Responsiveness, Punctuality, Quality, Professionalism, Value

fields.text: Great, professional work.

fields.name: Rita N.
fields.text: I highly recommend this company. Prompt, professional and provided complete details of work before and after.

fields.name: A. Thomas
fields.text: Awesome to deal with! Extremely Professional, Knowledgeable & Timely!! Thank you David!

fields.text: I love my roof

fields.name: Aqueel A.
fields.text: Good job as promised.

fields.name: J. Stevens
fields.text: Tetralto Roofing replaced my roof in April.  Hurricane Beryl a couple months later was a good test and our new roof passed with flying colors.  Prior to selecting a contractor, I got at least 5 or 6 bids.  Of these, the selection came down to two I felt comfortable with as contractors who could be trusted.  A competitive Price is always a factor when selecting a contractor, but material quality, workmanship, and supervision must also be considered.  As a retired industrial construction engineer, I dealt with many contractors over the years, both good and bad.  Without reservation, I can say that David and his crew performed above even my expectations.

fields.author: David Fohr

fields.title: Say Goodbye to Ugly Box Vents: A Roof Ventilation Upgrade Story
fields.meta_description: Say Goodbye to Ugly Box Vents
fields.content:
Are you tired of those outdated, eyesore box vents on your roof? We recently had the pleasure of upgrading a customer's roof ventilation system, and the results were truly transformational!

Our customer, let's call her Mrs. Smith, had been dealing with old box vents that not only looked unappealing but were also inefficient at ventilating her attic. With our expertise and dedication to quality, we suggested upgrading her ventilation system to ridge vents, which offer superior ventilation and a sleek, modern look.

![Box vents looking ugly on a roof](/static/images/blog-ugly-box-vents-1.webp)
**Box vents looking ugly on a roof**

Before the upgrade, Mrs. Smith's roof looked like a typical suburban home, with box vents protruding from the roofline. These vents were not only detracting from the curb appeal of her home but were also not providing adequate ventilation for her attic, leading to potential issues like moisture buildup and poor air quality.

After performing ventilation requirements calculations to verify that the solution was appropriate, and discussing the benefits of ridge vents, Mrs. Smith was excited to move forward with the upgrade. Our team got to work, removing the old box vents and installing the new ridge vents along the peak of her roof. The difference was stunning!

![Cleaner, modern appearance with ridge vents](/static/images/blog-ugly-box-vents-2.webp)
**Cleaner, modern appearance with ridge vents**

The new ridge vents not only improved the ventilation of Mrs. Smith's attic, helping to regulate temperature and reduce moisture, but they also gave her roof a modern and clean appearance. The sleek lines of the ridge vents blended seamlessly with her roofline, enhancing the overall look of her home.

Mrs. Smith was thrilled with the results, and we were delighted to have been able to improve both the functionality and aesthetics of her roof. If you're considering upgrading your roof ventilation system, don't hesitate to reach out to us at Tetralto Roofing. We're here to help you achieve a roof that not only looks great but works great too!

Box vents looking ugly on a roof

fields.title: Transforming Homes with Quality Roofing ‚Äì A Recent Project in Braeburn Featuring Malarkey Vista¬Æ AR Shingles
fields.meta_description: See how Tetralto Roofing upgraded a Braeburn home with Storm Grey Malarkey Vista¬Æ AR shingles & new gutters for style, durability & protection!
fields.content:
At **Tetralto Roofing**, we take pride in each project we complete, and our most recent roofing transformation in the **Braeburn** neighborhood is a perfect example of how the right materials and professional installation can elevate the look of a home. We had the pleasure of working with fantastic homeowners on this project, and the results were truly outstanding.

 ![alt](/static/images/blog-braeburn-1.avif)

For this job, we installed **Malarkey Vista¬Æ AR** shingles in the sleek **Storm Grey** color. These high-performance shingles are not only visually appealing but also offer superior protection against algae growth, keeping the roof looking fresh and clean over time. The Storm Grey color beautifully complemented the home‚Äôs exterior, giving it a modern, refined look that truly enhanced its curb appeal.

 ![alt](/static/images/blog-braeburn-2.avif)

In addition to the roofing, we also installed new gutters to ensure the home has a reliable drainage system. This combination of a durable roof and efficient gutters creates a long-lasting solution to protect the home from weather-related issues. The end result? As the homeowners put it, their home received ‚Äúa facelift,‚Äù and we couldn‚Äôt agree more!

 ![alt](/static/images/blog-braeburn-3.avif)

The Braeburn community is known for its charming homes, and this project added even more character to the neighborhood. Working with such kind and enthusiastic homeowners made the process even more enjoyable, and we‚Äôre thrilled with how the project turned out.

At Tetralto Roofing, we‚Äôre committed to delivering not only top-quality roofing systems but also an exceptional customer experience. Whether you need a full roof replacement, gutter installation, or both, we‚Äôre here to make your home look and perform at its best.

 ![alt](/static/images/blog-braeburn-4.avif)

fields.author: David Fohr

fields.title: From Woes to Wows!
fields.meta_description: Leak emergency in Missouri City, TX? We replaced a failing roof with GAF Timberline HDZ¬Æ in Slate, delivering durability, style & peace of mind!
fields.content:
This homeowner in **Missouri City, TX**, was dealing with a serious ceiling leak, so we jumped in right away to stop the damage from getting worse. After inspecting the roof, we found it was in rough shape overall, and a full replacement was the best long-term solution.

![alt](/static/images/blog-wows-1.avif)

Once the homeowner gave us the green light, our expert crew got to work, replacing the old, worn-out roof with a brand-new **GAF Timberline HDZ¬Æ** roofing system in **Slate**. These high-performance architectural shingles offer exceptional durability, advanced wind resistance, and long-lasting curb appeal. Now, the home is leak-free, worry-free, and built to withstand the elements for years to come!

![alt](/static/images/blog-wows-2.avif)

At Tetralto Roofing, we don‚Äôt just fix roofs‚Äîwe provide lasting protection and peace of mind. If you‚Äôre dealing with leaks or an aging roof, we‚Äôre here to help!

![alt](/static/images/blog-wows-3.avif)

![alt](/static/images/blog-wows-4.avif)

fields.title: Roofing Elevation: Bridging Aesthetics and Functionality Amidst Houston's Skyline
fields.meta_description: Roof replacement in downtown Houston with a view
fields.content:
Elevating Architecture and Views: Feast your eyes on our latest project, where innovation meets panoramic beauty! We had the privilege of replacing the roofs of a stunning home featuring a unique skillion and butterfly roof designs, creating a striking visual contrast. As the sun sets over downtown Houston, with the iconic Minute Maid Stadium in view, our craftsmanship shines as brilliantly as the city lights. This project resents roofing as both an art and a science, showcasing our dedication to marrying sound roofing science with beautiful design.

![alt](/static/images/blog-elevation-1.avif)

![alt](/static/images/blog-elevation-4.avif)

fields.title: Financing Your Roofing Project in Missouri City: Smart Options to Consider
fields.meta_description: Explore practical roofing financing solutions in Missouri City, from insurance claims to credit unions and flexible payment plans.
fields.content:
## Your Roof, Your Investment ‚Äì Flexible Financing Solutions

A new roof is one of the most important investments you can make for your Missouri City home, protecting it from Texas storms while enhancing curb appeal and value. At Tetralto Roofing, we know that financing such a project can feel overwhelming, but we‚Äôre here to help. We offer guidance on financing options so you can make the best decision for your home and budget.

 ![alt](/static/images/blog-financing-1.webp)

## Roofing Financing Options to Fit Your Needs

### Insurance Claims ‚Äì Our Expertise at Work

If your roof has suffered storm, hail, or wind damage, your homeowner‚Äôs insurance may cover part or all of the replacement cost.

**Advantages:**  
- Reduces out-of-pocket expenses  
- Covers unexpected storm-related damage  
- Professional assessment of damage  

**How Tetralto Roofing Helps:**

- We provide free roof inspections to assess insurance-eligible damage.  
- Our team works directly with your insurance adjuster to streamline the process.  
- We document all damage with detailed reports and photos.  
- We assist in understanding policy coverage and deductible requirements.  
- We attend adjuster meetings to ensure all damages are properly accounted for.  

### Local Credit Union Loans

Missouri City and the greater Houston area have excellent credit unions that often provide better rates and flexible terms compared to national banks.

**Local Credit Unions to Consider:**  
- First Service Credit Union  
- Houston Texas Fire Fighters Federal Credit Union  
- JSC Federal Credit Union  
- Houston Federal Credit Union  
- Smart Financial Credit Union  

**Advantages:**
- Lower interest rates than most banks  
- More flexible approval criteria 
- Personalized service with local financial institutions 

### Credit Card Payments ‚Äì A Quick and Flexible Option

For smaller projects or urgent repairs, credit cards can be a convenient way to finance roofing expenses.

**Advantages:**  
- Immediate access to funds  
- Potential cashback or rewards 
- No lengthy application process 

**Considerations:**  
- Higher interest rates compared to other financing options  
- Best for short-term financing if paid off quickly  
- Look for 0% APR introductory offers for larger projects  

### Home Equity Loans or HELOC ‚Äì Tapping into Your Home‚Äôs Value

With rising home values in Missouri City and Sugar Land, homeowners can leverage their equity for roofing projects.

**Advantages:** 
- Lower interest rates compared to personal loans or credit cards  
- Fixed monthly payments (home equity loan) or flexible access (HELOC)  
- Potential tax benefits (consult your tax advisor)  

**Considerations:**  
- Your home serves as collateral  
- Application and approval process takes time  
- Closing costs and fees may apply  

### Personal Loans ‚Äì A Simple Alternative

Unsecured personal loans from banks, credit unions, or online lenders offer a straightforward way to finance your roofing project.

**Advantages:**  
- No collateral required  
- Fixed interest rates and predictable payments  
- Faster approval compared to home equity options  

**Considerations:**  
- Higher interest rates than home equity loans  
- Credit score impacts loan terms  

### FHA Title I Home Improvement Loans ‚Äì Government-Backed Financing

For homeowners with limited equity, the Federal Housing Administration (FHA) offers financing for home improvements, including roofing.

**Advantages:**  
- Available to homeowners with minimal home equity  
- Fixed interest rates with predictable repayment  
- Loans up to $25,000 for single-family homes  

**Considerations:**  
- Requires an FHA-approved lender  
- Application process can take time  
- Mortgage insurance may be required  

## Planning Ahead for Roof Replacement in Texas

Given our unpredictable Texas weather, planning ahead is key to managing roofing expenses. Here‚Äôs how you can prepare:

- **Emergency Fund:** Set aside savings for home maintenance.  
- **Scheduled Savings:** If your roof is aging, start setting money aside for replacement.  
- **Annual Inspections:** We offer free yearly checkups on major repairs and replacements to catch issues early.  
- **Regular Maintenance:** Extend your roof‚Äôs lifespan with proactive care to minimize costly surprises.  

## Why Work with Tetralto Roofing?

We believe in honest assessments, quality craftsmanship, and customer-focused service. When you choose Tetralto Roofing, you can count on:

- Transparent cost breakdowns to help plan your budget  
- Expert assistance with insurance claims  
- Acceptance of all major credit cards for flexible payments  
- Trusted recommendations for local financing options  

## Get Started Today!

Ready to explore your roofing financing options? Contact Tetralto Roofing today for a free consultation and estimate. We‚Äôll help you find the best solution for your budget while ensuring your home is protected with a high-quality roofing system built to withstand Texas weather.

**Disclaimer:** This information is for educational purposes only. Tetralto Roofing does not provide financial advice. Consult with a financial advisor before making major financial decisions.
fields.content_html:
Your Roof, Your Investment ‚Äì Flexible Financing Solutions

A new roof is one of the most important investments you can make for your Missouri City home, protecting it from Texas storms while enhancing curb appeal and value. At Tetralto Roofing, we know that financing such a project can feel overwhelming, but we‚Äôre here to help. We offer guidance on financing options so you can make the best decision for your home and budget.

Roofing Financing Options to Fit Your Needs

Insurance Claims ‚Äì Our Expertise at Work

If your roof has suffered storm, hail, or wind damage, your homeowner‚Äôs insurance may cover part or all of the replacement cost.

Advantages:
- Reduces out-of-pocket expenses
- Covers unexpected storm-related damage
- Professional assessment of damage

How Tetralto Roofing Helps:

  • We provide free roof inspections to assess insurance-eligible damage.
  • Our team works directly with your insurance adjuster to streamline the process.
  • We document all damage with detailed reports and photos.

  • We attend adjuster meetings to ensure all damages are properly accounted for.

Local Credit Union Loans

Missouri City and the greater Houston area have excellent credit unions that often provide better rates and flexible terms compared to national banks.

Local Credit Unions to Consider:
- First Service Credit Union
- Houston Texas Fire Fighters Federal Credit Union
- JSC Federal Credit Union
- Houston Federal Credit Union
- Smart Financial Credit Union

Advantages: - Lower interest rates than most banks
- More flexible approval criteria - Personalized service with local financial institutions

Credit Card Payments ‚Äì A Quick and Flexible Option

For smaller projects or urgent repairs, credit cards can be a convenient way to finance roofing expenses.

Advantages:
- Immediate access to funds
- Potential cashback or rewards - No lengthy application process

Considerations:
- Higher interest rates compared to other financing options
- Best for short-term financing if paid off quickly
- Look for 0% APR introductory offers for larger projects

Home Equity Loans or HELOC ‚Äì Tapping into Your Home‚Äôs Value

With rising home values in Missouri City and Sugar Land, homeowners can leverage their equity for roofing projects.

Advantages: - Lower interest rates compared to personal loans or credit cards
- Fixed monthly payments (home equity loan) or flexible access (HELOC)
- Potential tax benefits (consult your tax advisor)

Considerations:
- Your home serves as collateral
- Application and approval process takes time
- Closing costs and fees may apply

Personal Loans ‚Äì A Simple Alternative

Unsecured personal loans from banks, credit unions, or online lenders offer a straightforward way to finance your roofing project.

Advantages:
- No collateral required
- Fixed interest rates and predictable payments
- Faster approval compared to home equity options

Considerations:
- Higher interest rates than home equity loans
- Credit score impacts loan terms

FHA Title I Home Improvement Loans ‚Äì Government-Backed Financing

For homeowners with limited equity, the Federal Housing Administration (FHA) offers financing for home improvements, including roofing.

Advantages:
- Available to homeowners with minimal home equity
- Fixed interest rates with predictable repayment
- Loans up to $25,000 for single-family homes

Considerations:
- Requires an FHA-approved lender
- Application process can take time
- Mortgage insurance may be required

  • Regular Maintenance: Extend your roof‚Äôs lifespan with proactive care to minimize costly surprises.
